title: What else did they do in the 1930s? - Quora

response.answer_text: Besides deal with a world-wide depression, you mean? I learned recently that the 1930s was a significant decade for the experimentation and implementation of traffic signals and pedestrian crossings. There had been a good bit of death on the street, as it were, with the increase of more and more cars on the roads, and that was the time when public officials decided to try to reduce the casualties.
